description: Datasets from the Massachusetts Department of Education, as CSV files transformed from HTML tables.

dataset.title: Student Discipline Data Report, showing number of students disciplined by demographic, year, and type of discipline.
dataset.description: The Student Discipline Data Report reports the disciplines that public school students in Massachusetts received for the offenses committed, as reported by school districts in the School Safety Discipline Report (SSDR).

publisher.name: Massachusetts Department of Elementary and Secondary Education

distribution.description: Student Discipline report for Arlington, MA for years 2013-2019, transformed to a single CSV by Year column.
distribution.title: MADOE-StudentDiscipline.csv

dataset.title: School Staffing By Race
dataset.description: Staffing Data by Race, Ethnicity, Gender by Full-time Equivalents (2008-20)

publisher.name: Massachusetts Department of Elementary and Secondary Education

distribution.description: Staffing Data by race report for Arlington, MA for years 2008-2020, transformed to a single CSV by Year column.
distribution.title: MADOE-StaffingData.csv

dataset.title: Student population by Grade
dataset.description: Student Population by Race & Ethnicity per Grade Level, 2019

publisher.name: Massachusetts Department of Elementary and Secondary Education

distribution.description: Student Population by Race & Ethnicity per Grade Level, 2019, with %age columns calculated.
distribution.title: MADOE-district-graderace.csv
